info.name: Charles Archer
info.description: I'm Charles Archer, a Senior Software Engineer specializing in full-stack development and technical leadership. I lead engineering teams in developing mission-critical aerospace systems while also building modern web and mobile applications. My expertise spans from low-level systems programming to cloud-native applications, working across the full technology stack. Whether developing command and control systems, building cross-platform mobile apps with React Native and AWS, or creating intuitive web experiences, I bring technical excellence and proven leadership to every project. Let's build something remarkable together.

experience.title: Deputy Product Owner
experience.description: Leading a team of 10+ engineers in developing a Command and Control (C2) system for air refueling operations through code reviews, feature integration, and stakeholder coordination.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Developing software for Command and Control (C2) ground stations supporting multiple unmanned aerial vehicle platforms, delivering mission-critical capabilities and cutting-edge pilot vehicle interfaces.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed software for a high-fidelity, real-time simulation system to simulate environmental data for pilot training devices and contributed to Command and Control (C2) ground station development.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Supported a high-fidelity, real-time simulation software system by diagnosing and resolving complex defects and streamlining data manipulation processes to improve efficiency.

projects.title: KEVIN
projects.description: A cross-platform social review application built with React Native and AWS, enabling users to share reviews with ratings, images, and venue tagging. The platform features a configurable architecture that can be adapted to any review format through centralized parameter management, supporting use cases from restaurant reviews to product ratings. Deployed via AWS Amplify with full compatibility across web, iOS, and Android platforms.
features: Review posting with ratings, images, and venue tagging
Configurable architecture for multiple review formats

projects.title: Monaco
projects.description: An AI-powered real estate chatbot built with React Native and AWS, providing agents with conversational access to MLS listings, market analysis, and automated workflow tools. The application features voice and text chat interfaces that enable natural language interactions for querying properties, analyzing market trends, managing leads, and generating professional CMA documents. Deployed cross-platform via AWS Amplify for web, iOS, and Android.
features: MLS listing queries via natural language

projects.title: Miramar Pain Medicine
projects.description: A comprehensive React-based website for a pain medicine practice featuring a modern design system with gradient backgrounds, responsive navigation, and content-driven architecture. The site dynamically loads all content from JSON configuration files, making updates seamless without code changes. Built with accessibility and user experience as top priorities, it includes contact form integration with API endpoints, animated FAQ accordions, detailed service descriptions, and a professional footer with business hours. The design emphasizes trust and professionalism through clean layouts, consistent theming, and intuitive navigation patterns.
features: Interactive contact form with API integration

projects.title: About Monaco
projects.description: A modern, single-page React application serving as the marketing landing page for Monaco, an AI-powered real estate assistant. The site features smooth scroll animations, responsive design, and a polished user experience with dark/light theme support. Built to convert visitors into waitlist signups, it showcases Monaco's key features through engaging visuals, testimonials, and strategic call-to-action placements. The design emphasizes clean aesthetics and performance optimization for maximum conversion.

projects.title: Musician Portfolio
projects.description: A React-based web application designed to showcase an artist's complete profile, including bio, music catalog, tour dates, photo gallery, and merchandise. The app dynamically loads content from a JSON file and presents it through an engaging, user-friendly interface with smooth animations and theme switching. Built with conditional rendering to ensure only available content sections are displayed, creating a clean and professional experience tailored to the artist's current offerings.

projects.title: Developer Portfolio
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React, featuring smooth animations, theme switching, and easy customization through JSON configuration. The site showcases my professional experience, technical skills, and project work through an engaging, interactive interface optimized for all device sizes. Built with a focus on performance and user experience, it includes a dark/light theme toggle, smooth scroll animations, and a comprehensive project showcase with modal galleries.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Bot
projects.description: I designed and developed the front end and database for a cryptocurrency trading app, using React for the UI and MongoDB for efficient data storage. The app seamlessly integrates TradingView alerts via webhooks to execute transactions on Binance, featuring user-friendly functions like token management, transaction history, and profit analytics.

projects.title: Buxon Development Group
projects.description: I led the design and development of web applications for a Non-Fungible Token project on the Solana blockchain, also managing their deployment on AWS for seamless integration. Additionally, I contributed as the main artist, shaping the project's visual identity and artistic elements.

projects.title: Metajuana NFT Staking
projects.description: I developed a Vue.js-based staking platform for the Metajuana NFT collection, focusing on creating an intuitive user interface that simplified the staking process for NFT holders. The platform featured real-time reward tracking and wallet integration, all deployed on AWS for reliable performance and scalability.

projects.title: Beartoshi NFT Staking
projects.description: I engineered a TypeScript-powered staking solution for the Beartoshi NFT project, emphasizing performance optimization and user experience. The application provided NFT holders with a streamlined interface to manage their staked assets and monitor rewards, leveraging AWS infrastructure for robust deployment.

projects.title: Sol Raiderz NFT Staking
projects.description: I built a comprehensive staking platform for Sol Raiderz NFT holders using Vue.js and TypeScript, creating a visually engaging interface that enhanced community participation. The project included custom CSS animations and responsive design patterns, all managed through AWS for seamless scalability and deployment.

projects.title: Zankoku NFT Staking
projects.description: I developed and deployed a Solana-based staking interface for the Zankoku NFT collection, utilizing Vue.js and TypeScript to deliver a polished, user-friendly experience. The platform featured advanced CSS styling and interactive elements, with AWS handling the backend infrastructure to ensure reliable uptime and performance.
